scripts.dev:api: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.test: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && pytest tests/ -v
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd backend && python3.13 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
